languages.text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.
languages.original_text: Когда союзник охотника за головами убивает {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добычу{/g}, не имеющую эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}преследование{/g}", охотник за головами получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с половиной запаса своих {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, однако во время этого хода он не может атаковать.

traits.locale_text: Whenever prey that is not being trailed is killed by an ally, the Hunter gains an extra turn with half of their MP and AP. The Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.
Whenever prey that is not being trailed is killed by an ally, the Hunter gains an extra turn with half of their MP and AP. The Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

languages.text: Когда союзник охотника за головами убивает {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}добычу{/g}, не имеющую эффекта "{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}преследование{/g}", охотник за головами получает {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g} с половиной запаса своих {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}ОП{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g}, однако во время этого хода он не может атаковать.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник охотника убивает добычу, не имеющую эффекта "преследование", охотник получает дополнительный ход с половиной запаса своих ОП и ОД, однако во время этого хода он не может атаковать.
Когда союзник охотника убивает добычу, не имеющую эффекта "преследование", охотник получает дополнительный ход с половиной запаса своих ОП и ОД, однако во время этого хода он не может атаковать.

languages.text: 每当盟友杀死一名未被{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追踪{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}时，赏金猎人便会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，同时获得一半{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。不过，赏金猎人在此额外回合中无法攻击。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: 每当盟友杀死一名未被追踪的猎物时，猎人便会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，同时获得一半{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。猎人在此额外回合中无法攻击。

每当盟友杀死一名未被{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追踪{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}猎物{/g}时，{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}便会获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，同时获得一半{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}移动点数{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。不过，赏金猎人在此额外{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}中{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}。

languages.text: Cada vez que un aliado mate a una {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} que no esté siendo {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}rastreada{/g}, el cazarrecompensas gana un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con la mitad de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. El cazarrecompensas no puede atacar durante este turno extra.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un aliado mate a una {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}presa{/g} que no esté siendo {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}rastreada{/g}, el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} gana un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} con la mitad de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PM{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. El cazarrecompensas {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g} durante este {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} extra.

languages.text: Immer wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}, die nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}verfolgt{/g} wird, von einem Verbündeten getötet wird, erhält der Kopfgeldjäger einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit der Hälfte seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Der Kopfgeldjäger kann während dieses zusätzlichen Zugs nicht angreifen.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn eine {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}Beute{/g}, die nicht {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}verfolgt{/g} wird, von einem Verbündeten getötet wird, erhält der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g} mit der Hälfte seiner {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}BP{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Der Kopfgeldjäger kann während dieses zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}nicht angreifen{/g}.

languages.text: Chaque fois qu'une {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}proie{/g} non {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}traquée{/g} est tuée par un allié, le chasseur de primes bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec la moitié de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Pendant ce tour supplémentaire, le chasseur de primes ne peut pas attaquer.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois qu'une proie non traquée est tuée par un allié, le Chasseur bénéficie d'un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} avec la moitié de ses {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}PD{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g}. Pendant ce tour supplémentaire, le Chasseur ne peut pas attaquer.

languages.text: 味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追跡中{/g}でない{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}を倒すたびに、バウンティハンターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が半分の{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得る。バウンティハンターはこの追加ターン中は攻撃できない。
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.

traits.locale_text: 味方が{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}追跡中{/g}でない{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}を倒すたびに、バウンティハンターは{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が半分の{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得る。バウンティハンターはこの追加ターン中は攻撃できない。

追跡中でない{g|Encyclopedia:Prey}獲物{/g}が味方に{g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}トレイル{/g}されるたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}は{g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が半分の{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得る。バウンティハンターはこの追加{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}中は{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃できない{/g}。

languages.text: Bir dost birim ne zaman {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}izlenmeyen{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}avı{/g} öldürse Ödül Avcısı, yarı {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}HP{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g}'ye sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanır. Ödül Avcısı, bu ek turda saldırı yapamaz.
languages.original_text: Whenever {g|Encyclopedia:Prey}prey{/g} that is not being {g|Encyclopedia:Trailed}trailed{/g} is killed by an ally, the Bounty Hunter gains an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} with half of their {g|Encyclopedia:MovementPoints}MP{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. The Bounty Hunter cannot attack during this extra turn.
